resources.string:
Greetings from Italy!
Thank you for using CashFlow!
This is my first Android application and I hope you like it, I am developing it for fun as side project in my free/spare time.
Feel free to share it with your friends and relatives!
If you like this app/have suggestions/want to leave a feedback, please leave a review on the Play Store!
Thank you for showing support for the project!\n\nUnfortunately, for the Google policies, I am not authorized to keep the direct link to the donation page. However, you can check my GitHub page.
